articles.title: Add reactivity to an existing source using GraphQL Mesh
articles.description: How To extend an existing endpoint with subscriptions to bring reactivity to your application.

articles.title: Migrating from Schemaless REST API to GraphQL without writing any code
articles.description: Migrating to GraphQL from a REST API has never been easier. With tools like GraphQL Mesh you can do it automatically, without writing code and even if you don't have any schema for your existing REST API sources.

articles.title: GraphQL Mesh - Query anything, run anywhere
articles.description: We are excited to announce GraphQL Mesh.
